definition: Dianshan Lake between Shanghai Municipality and Jiangsu Province
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The paper presents a comprehensive analysis of the cage aquaculture in DianshanLake-a water source lake.
sentences.chinese: 本文對作爲水源地的澱山湖網箱養魚進行了綜合分析。
